data.message: Good morning Facebook. My question is about the status color selections.. I don't have it. Is it something I have to sign up for or is this something you are testing and everyone doesn't have it yet?

replies.message: Hi Sandy. You can learn how to add a background color here: http://bit.ly/2p8rCVD. If you're not seeing this option after uninstalling and reinstalling your app, please feel free to share your interest in this feature here: http://bit.ly/2p8x3Un. -Joe
